-children.#comment: The following component tag is needed since LineProperties node is not part of the default Immersive profile

meta.@content: X3D book, X3D graphics, X3D-Edit, http://www.x3dGraphics.com
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

-children.#comment: linetype='6' (optional support) single arrow, meainging single arrowhead at final vertex, in this case pointing to right
linetype='8' (optional support) double arrow, meaning arrow heads at each end
